     1  package types

     3  import (
     4  	"encoding/hex"
     5  
     6  	"cosmossdk.io/math"
     7  
     8  	"github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield/sdk/keys"
     9  	"github.com/cometbft/cometbft/crypto/secp256k1"
    10  	sdk "github.com/cosmos/cosmos-sdk/types"
    11  )
    12  
    13  // TODO: Will add an AccountRegister struct to manage multi account.
    14  
    15  type Account struct {
    16  	name string
    17  	km   keys.KeyManager
    18  }
    19  
    20  type TransferDetail struct {
    21  	ToAddress string
    22  	Amount    math.Int
    23  }
    24  
    25  func NewAccountFromPrivateKey(name, privKey string) (*Account, error) {
    26  	km, err := keys.NewPrivateKeyManager(privKey)
    27  	if err != nil {
    28  		return nil, err
    29  	}
    30  	return &Account{
    31  		name: name,
    32  		km:   km,
    33  	}, nil
    34  }
    35  
    36  func NewAccountFromMnemonic(name, mnemonic string) (*Account, error) {
    37  	km, err := keys.NewMnemonicKeyManager(mnemonic)
    38  	if err != nil {
    39  		return nil, err
    40  	}
    41  	return &Account{
    42  		name: name,
    43  		km:   km,
    44  	}, nil
    45  }
    46  
    47  // TODO: return mnemonic to user
    48  
    49  func NewAccount(name string) (*Account, string, error) {
    50  	privKey := secp256k1.GenPrivKey()
    51  	km, err := keys.NewPrivateKeyManager(hex.EncodeToString(privKey.Bytes()))
    52  	if err != nil {
    53  		return nil, "", err
    54  	}
    55  	return &Account{
    56  		name: name,
    57  		km:   km,
    58  	}, hex.EncodeToString(privKey.Bytes()), nil
    59  }
    60  
    61  func (a *Account) GetKeyManager() keys.KeyManager {
    62  	return a.km
    63  }
    64  
    65  func (a *Account) GetAddress() sdk.AccAddress {
    66  	return a.km.GetAddr()
    67  }
    68  
    69  func (a *Account) Sign(unsignBytes []byte) ([]byte, error) {
    70  	return a.km.Sign(unsignBytes)
    71  }
